titles.title: Estate Tax Reduction and Simplification Act of 1999

To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to eliminate the complexities of the estate tax deduction for family-owned business and farm interests by increasing the unified estate and gift tax credit to $3,000,000 for all taxpayers.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 10/21/1999--Introduced. Estate Tax Reduction and Simplification Act of 1999 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the unified estate tax credit deduction to $3 million.
